sentences.en: A car's starter is basically an electric motor.
sentences.cn: 汽车的启动装置基本上是个电动机。

sentences.en: Although the car is basically sound, I was worried about certain areas.
sentences.cn: 尽管这辆汽车基本状况良好，我还是担心一些地方不够安全。

sentences.en: As far as I can tell, Jason is basically a nice guy.
sentences.cn: 据我所知，贾森算得上是个好人。

sentences.en: Basically the system ought to have worked.
sentences.cn: 其实这套系统本应发挥作用的。
大致说来，你有两个选择。

sentences.en: I used to see him every night, basically.
sentences.cn: 基本上，我以前每天晚上都见他。

sentences.en: I was basically a dreadful coward.
sentences.cn: 从根本上说,我非常胆小怕事.

sentences.en: If the examination shows your company enjoys basically good health, read on.
sentences.cn: 要是审查表明你们公司的运营状况基本良好，请继续往下读。
从根本上来讲，这是严格的素食主义饮食。

sentences.en: She was basically fenced in by what the military wanted to do.
sentences.cn: 军旅事务使她基本上无法脱身。

sentences.en: The official report basically exonerated everyone.
sentences.cn: 官方报道基本上宣布所有人无罪。

sentences.en: Their medical problems are basically physical in origin.
sentences.cn: 他们的病症主要是由于身体原因引起的。

sentences.en: Turn right and just basically walk straight, right over the river.
sentences.cn: 向右转,然后大致直着往前走,越过小河.

sentences.en: Well, basically, it’s a matter of filling in a few forms.
sentences.cn: 嗯，其实也就是填几张表的事。

trans.tran_en: used to emphasize the most important reason or fact about something, or a simple explanation of something
